title: As we are all in the Evening of our life after experiencing many ups and downs and agonies and ecstasies...

object.content:
As we are all in the Evening of our life after experiencing many ups and downs and agonies and ecstasies, we all should meet with a grand design of being happy and communicating happiness during our get together on Sunday,the 8th December this year.

Yes, the date has been confirmed by the members of the core committee through mail and the venue and other details will be communicated to you soon after our core committee meeting on the 25th of this month.

Since the meet will be in Chennai, I request all those who are staying in other places and in foreign countries to make their travel plan accordingly.

I, on my own behalf and on behalf of our core committee , request you all to attend our get together without fail and make it a grand success and a memorable one.
